text:
Very convenient way to get from Universal Studios to Vivo City Mall.

Plus, it’s free.

It’s not very crowded and just a short ride.

First stop on the sentosa monorail and also the most popular and crowded because it caters to universal studios.
Very crowded, has a large line but well managed

Budget hack: the monorail fee of 8 SGD is only beeing collected at Vivio City. to avoid the fee, you can just havf a nice walk from Vivio City over the bridge to Resorts World Station. From there you can use the monorail for free to thr beach or back to Vivio City ;)
Fastest and cheap way to visit sentosa and universal studios. Depart from vivo city station, cost 4$ per person. The way back is free of charge. This station is the station for universal studios
Please add more frequencies on your train, especially for closing time. You can't have people waiting for half an hour or more just to get into the train
